focus_area: Rapid Recap Jaundice Cirrhosis and SBP
text:
# Rapid Recap: Jaundice and Cirrhosis Emergencies
1. Painless jaundice + Courvoisier sign은 malignancy 우선 평가.
2. Mild unconjugated hyperbilirubinemia + normal LFT는 Gilbert syndrome 가능.
3. Cirrhosis 환자 confusion/asterixis는 hepatic encephalopathy, trigger 교정 + lactulose.
4. ALF triad: severe injury + INR>=1.5 + encephalopathy.
5. Ascites PMN>=250는 SBP로 즉시 ceftriaxone, albumin 병행.
6. SAAG>=1.1은 portal HTN 원인군 우선 고려.

subject: LM_GIT 1 2f746f2986ee80c5bf7bfff60573e7e3
focus_area: Cirrhosis Stigmata SAAG and HRS Overview
text:
# Cirrhosis Complications Framework
| Vignette | Diagnosis | Immediate direction |
| --- | --- | --- |
| stigmata + portal signs | cirrhosis | decompensation screening 시작 |
| SAAG > 1.1 | portal hypertension ascites | 원인(간경변/심부전/Budd-Chiari) 감별 |
| PMN >= 250 in ascites | SBP | ceftriaxone + albumin |
| rising Cr, volume challenge 불응 | HRS | vasoconstrictor + albumin |
| confusion + asterixis | hepatic encephalopathy | lactulose +/- rifaximin |

## Core path
- portal HTN이 varices/ascites/splenomegaly를 유발.
- 합성기능 저하는 INR↑, albumin↓, platelet↓로 반영.

subject: LM_GIT 1 2f746f2986ee80c5bf7bfff60573e7e3
focus_area: Ascites SBP HRS HE and HPS Details
text:
# Ascites, SBP, HRS, HE, and Hepatopulmonary Syndrome
## Ascites treatment
- sodium restriction + spironolactone/furosemide(100:40).
- 대량천자 시 albumin 보충.

## SBP
- PMN >=250면 배양결과 대기 없이 치료 시작.
- ceftriaxone + albumin(renal protection).

## HRS
- cirrhosis에서 신장 자체 손상 없이 기능저하.
- volume challenge에 반응 없고 urine Na 낮은 패턴.
- 치료: midodrine + octreotide + albumin, definitive는 liver transplant.

## HE
- triggers(감염/GI bleed/변비/저K/약물) 교정 필수.
- lactulose 1차, rifaximin 추가.

## Hepatopulmonary syndrome
- platypnea/orthodeoxia, bubble echo로 진단 보조, definitive는 transplant.

subject: LM_GIT 1 2f746f2986ee80c5bf7bfff60573e7e3
focus_area: Budd Chiari and Liver Abscess Differential
text:
# Budd-Chiari and Liver Abscess Differential
## Budd-Chiari syndrome
- hepatic vein thrombosis로 RUQ pain, hepatomegaly, ascites.
- hypercoagulable state/PV/OCP/임신 연관.
- Doppler US 선별, 항응고 및 원인치료.

## Liver abscess
| Feature | Pyogenic abscess | Amebic abscess |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Common context | biliary source/older/comorbid | 여행력/이주력/젊은층 |
| Pattern | multiple 가능 | 우엽 단일 병변 흔함 |
| Aspiration | purulent pus | anchovy-paste appearance |
| Treatment | drainage + antibiotics | metronidazole 중심, routine drainage 불필요 |

- 치료가 반대이므로 감별이 핵심.

subject: LM_GIT 1 2f746f2986ee80c5bf7bfff60573e7e3
text:
# Biliary Tract Diagnostic Framework and Stone Categories
## First fork
- ALP 상승 시 GGT로 hepatobiliary vs bone origin 확인.
- RUQ US에서 duct dilation 여부가 다음 검사/치료 방향 결정.

## Gallstone categories
- 무증상 결석: 관찰.
- biliary colic: elective cholecystectomy.
- complicated disease(acute cholecystitis, choledocholithiasis, cholangitis): 단계적 응급관리.

## Key workflows
- acute cholecystitis: NPO/IV/Abx + 조기 cholecystectomy.
- choledocholithiasis: ERCP로 CBD stone 제거 후 담낭수술.
- cholangitis: resuscitation + antibiotics + biliary drainage(ERCP).

subject: LM_GIT 1 2f746f2986ee80c5bf7bfff60573e7e3
focus_area: Acute Cholangitis Special Cases and PSC vs PBC
text:
# Acute Cholangitis Timing, ICU Gallbladder Syndromes, PSC vs PBC
## Cholangitis severity
- Charcot triad: fever + RUQ pain + jaundice.
- Reynolds pentad(저혈압/혼동 추가)은 즉시 응급 배액 필요.

## ICU/special gallbladder entities
- acalculous cholecystitis: critically ill, 초기엔 percutaneous cholecystostomy 고려.
- emphysematous cholecystitis: diabetic male + gas-forming infection, 응급 수술 필요.

## Autoimmune cholangiopathy
| Feature | PSC | PBC |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Typical patient | male + UC | middle-aged woman |
| Distribution | intra+extrahepatic ducts | small intrahepatic ducts |
| Signature | beading on MRCP/ERCP | AMA positive |
| Major risk | cholangiocarcinoma | progressive cholestatic cirrhosis |
| Core treatment | symptom/stricture management, transplant | ursodeoxycholic acid |

subject: LM_GIT 1 2f746f2986ee80c5bf7bfff60573e7e3
text:
# Rapid Recap: Biliary Emergency Hierarchy
| Scenario | Diagnosis | Action |
| --- | --- | --- |
| fatty meal pain, transient | biliary colic | elective chole |
| fever + murphy | acute cholecystitis | early surgery pathway |
| jaundice + dilated CBD | choledocholithiasis | ERCP first |
| charcot/reynolds | acute cholangitis | urgent drainage + IV Abx |
| ICU sepsis no stones | acalculous cholecystitis | cholecystostomy 고려 |
| UC male with beading | PSC | malignancy surveillance |
| AMA+ itchy female | PBC | ursodiol |

subject: LM_GIT 1 2f746f2986ee80c5bf7bfff60573e7e3
text:
# Acute Pancreatitis: Presentation, Diagnosis, Etiology
| Diagnostic component | Practical point |
| --- | --- |
| Typical pain | severe epigastric pain radiating to back |
| Enzyme criterion | lipase/amylase >=3x ULN |
| Imaging | early CT routine 아님, 필요 시 선택 |

## Initial imaging logic
- gallstone 의심 시 RUQ US 우선.
- 초기 진단 목적 CT 남용은 피하고 합병증 의심 시점에 사용.

## High-yield causes
- gallstones, alcohol이 대부분.
- ALT >150이면 gallstone pancreatitis 시사.
- 기타: hyperTG, hyperCa, ERCP 후, 약물, 외상 등.

subject: LM_GIT 1 2f746f2986ee80c5bf7bfff60573e7e3
focus_area: Severe Pancreatitis and Pancreatic Cystic Complications
text:
# Severe Pancreatitis and Pancreatic Complications
## Severe disease markers
- age/BMI, hemoconcentration, rising BUN, CRP 상승, 출혈성 피부징후가 위험도 상승 신호.

## Core management pillars
- aggressive LR hydration, analgesia, early enteral nutrition.
- prophylactic antibiotics는 불필요하며 infected necrosis 때만 사용.

## Pseudocyst
- 보통 급성 췌장염 후 4주 이후 발생.
- 무증상 small은 관찰, 통증/감염/확대 시 drainage.

## Chronic pancreatitis
- chronic pain + steatorrhea + diabetes triad.
- CT calcification, 효소 정상 가능.
- 금주/금연, pancreatic enzyme replacement, 당대사 관리.
- splenic vein thrombosis로 isolated gastric varices 가능.

subject: LM_GIT 1 2f746f2986ee80c5bf7bfff60573e7e3
text:
# Chronic Pancreatitis Endgame and Spleen Emergencies
## Chronic pancreatitis follow-through
- exocrine insufficiency(steatorrhea)와 endocrine failure(type 3c diabetes) 동시 관리.
- 합병증으로 췌장암 위험, splenic vein thrombosis 고려.

## Splenic abscess
- fever + LUQ pain, infective endocarditis septic emboli 연관.
- 항생제 + 수술적 source control 필요할 수 있음.

## Splenic rupture
- 외상 또는 mono 관련 atraumatic rupture 가능.
- Kehr sign(좌견갑 통증) 단서.
- unstable은 즉시 수술, stable은 contrast CT 후 단계적 처치.

subject: LM_GIT 1 2f746f2986ee80c5bf7bfff60573e7e3
focus_area: Rapid Recap Pancreas Spleen to Small Bowel Transition
text:
# Rapid Recap: Pancreas and Spleen
1. acute pancreatitis 초기치료는 수액+진통+영양전략, 초기 CT 필수 아님.
2. gallstone pancreatitis 의심은 RUQ US와 담도평가가 중요.
3. infected necrosis는 항생제/배액 대상.
4. pseudocyst는 증상/크기/감염 여부로 배액 결정.
5. chronic pancreatitis는 효소보충과 생활습관 교정이 기반.
6. splenic rupture는 hemodynamic stability가 처치 분기점.

## Next unit
- small bowel 파트는 bloating/diarrhea에서 alarm feature 유무로 IBD/흡수장애/기능성 질환을 분기.

subject: LM_GIT 1 2f746f2986ee80c5bf7bfff60573e7e3
focus_area: Small Bowel Bloating and Diarrhea Differential
text:
# Small Bowel Entry: Bloating and Diarrhea Differential
## Big split
- alarm features(체중감소/야간증상/혈변/빈혈) 있으면 organic disease 우선 평가.
- alarm 없고 Rome criteria 충족 시 IBS 같은 기능성 질환 고려.

## Malabsorption axis
- steatorrhea + fat-soluble vitamin deficiency는 흡수장애 단서.
- cholestasis로 bile delivery 저하 시 지방흡수/비타민 D 결핍 -> 골질환 연결.

## IBS core
- Rome IV 기반 positive diagnosis.
- red flags 있으면 IBS 단정 금지, colonoscopy/추가검사로 IBD/암/셀리악 등 배제.

## Differential buckets
1. Inflammatory: IBD.
2. Malabsorptive: celiac, SIBO, bile acid 관련 장애.
3. Functional: IBS.
